text: Jabkay tum charhay chalay jarahey thay aur kissi ki taraf tawajja tak nahi kertay thay aur Allah kay rasool tumhen tumharay peechay say aawazen dey rahey thay bus tumhen ghum per ghum phoncha takay tum fot shuda cheez per ghumgeen na ho aur na phonchney wali (takleef) per udas ho Allah Taalaa tumharay tamam aemaal say khabardaar hai
